com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager

类 PolicyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.BaseManager
      • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.manager.PolicyManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CMHttpListener

    public class PolicyManager
extends BaseManager
implements CMHttpListener
    The manager manage policies, provide interface of below:

    1.request to policy server to get policy list
    2.get the active policy
    3.track the policy time and notify to ServiceController
